about_the_game:
Block N Load 2 - BETA!

It’s time to get block to business! The sequel to the acclaimed Block N Load brings even more chaos, creativity, destruction, and mayhem. Our heroes, some old and some new, find themselves transported forward 1000 years in time to exciting new worlds with new weapons, blocks, abilities, and designs. Join their ongoing battle as you collect resources, build up your defenses, and destroy your opponent's base with dozens of unique blocks. Choose the right hero to tip balance in your favor as you ASSEMBLE, SMASH, AND DOMINATE.


No game's the same!

Multiple new game modes ensure that games will always be different each time, and the need for teamwork and careful planning is even more important than before. A dynamic and easy building system gives you access to over 40 different blocks to change the level in real time and make every match unique!
Tunnel, destroy, attack, defend, construct, and shoot to thwart your enemies. Your every move and decision will impact the game, often times with devastatingly chaotic results. Plan your strategies and fight your foes for dominance and honor. Be creative, be sneaky, be fearless, be ruthless. Time to block in!

Our hero's

Beloved heroes return and new ones join the fray. A roster of unparalleled heroes gives you the opportunity to find one that suits your playstyle and allows you to help your team reach victory. Whether your forte is to attack, defend, heal, snipe, or support, there will be a perfect choice for you to experiment with.

The fun!

Intense battles, stunning effects, various heroes, weapons, blocks, and modes make playing Block N Load 2 an experience you will want to come back to again and again.


The Lore

Once upon a time, in a far-far away galaxy there existed a race of Cretas, who yearned for travel. Physical voyages were extremely laborious and long for such highly evolved beings though, so they designed the Temporal Net. The universal energy transformation system, using black holes and the tilt of the horizon, allowed Cretas to instantly travel between time and worlds.

The Cretas realized that the Temporal Net also had other properties. Cretas scientists learned how to use it for transition to the metaphysical form of existence. Cretas liked the idea of transforming into a disembodied free mind, in harmony with the universe, and anima-transfer became a very popular procedure. Soon the whole race disappeared from the observable universe, leaving behind ruins on wasted planets, and an unruly Temporal Net.

Without Cretas supervision, the Temporal Net began to glitch and randomly open portals in different worlds. It was easy to get in, but getting out was almost impossible. The Net generated copies of creatures that had fallen into it from an infinite number of alternative universes, simultaneously opening portals in them. Thus, its mass is growing at a catastrophic rate, making it difficult for the traveller to find the right portal and way home.

Explorers, scientists, and adventurers along with random passers-by will have to take up weapons and drive out competitors in the fight for the portals they need.

name: Block N Load 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 4 core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 6 core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1660 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

short_description: Get ready to ASSEMBLE, SMASH and DOMINATE! Face off in epic 5v5 matches where you can build up and destroy every block on any level while playing as the 22nd century’s greatest heroes. Work together and utilize insane abilities to claim victory!
